description: Allows for a custom javascript file and associated custom html file to be included as the response area. Note the custom javascript file must fit a certain template in order to work

html.description: filename of the custom html file (i.e. customHtml.html)

js.description: filename of the custom javascript file (i.e. customJs.js)

module.description: module name for the custom javascript file (i.e. customJs)
